alert.note: Alert for Cooke (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 02 at 3:20PM CST until March 02 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN COOKE AND SOUTHWESTERN GRAYSON COUNTIES... At 320 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ray Roberts Park Johnson Branch, or 8 miles northeast of Sanger, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Collinsville, Lake Kiowa, Ray Roberts Park Johnson Branch, Tioga, Road Runner, Valley View, Lake Ray Roberts, Ethel, Lois, Burns and Woodbine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for north central Texas.
